Package appeng.api.upgrades

package appeng.api.upgrades
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    appeng.api
     
  • Class
    Description
    ItemUpgradesChanged
    Callback for upgrade inventories crated through UpgradeInventories.forItem(net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack, int).
    IUpgradeableItem
    Counterpart for IUpgradeableObject, but for Item.
    IUpgradeableObject
    Implemented by block entities and parts that are upgradable through upgrade cards.
    IUpgradeInventory
    This specialized inventory can be used to insert and extract upgrade cards into AE2 machines.
    MachineUpgradesChanged
    Callback for upgrade inventories crated through UpgradeInventories.forMachine(net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike, int, appeng.api.upgrades.MachineUpgradesChanged).
    UpgradeInventories
    Utilities for creating upgrade inventories.
    Upgrades
    Manages available upgrades for AE machines, parts and items.
